about_the_game:
This DLC includes:

  • Unlock "Pennon and Battle" Enjoy Mode

Hint: If you have purchased the 'Enjoy Mode Expansion Pack' in "Pennon and Battle" before, you do not need to purchase this DLC again.

Enjoy Mode Introduction:

If you have purchased It, you can select the Enjoy Mode when launching the game.

  • No additional game content in Enjoy Mode

  • No in-app purchases

  • +50% Campaign rewards (Diamond, Aether Crystal, Event Card, Soulstone Chest). Other in-game rewards, like achievement and quest rewards, will not be increased.

Notes:

  • Both game modes have the same content. Please play the Standard Mode first to decide whether to purchase Enjoy Mode based on your gaming experience. Each mode will offer the full game content by completing campaigns.

  • The game data between the two modes can not be synchronized, including hero data and other content. Also, players of Standard Mode and Enjoy Mode cannot play together.

short_description: "Pennon and Battle" is a turn-based strategy war game. As a lord, you will play a crucial role in the revival of the kingdom! Lead heroes and armies to expand territory in Ruachland,  utilize tactics and magic to eliminate enemy forces, and create your own legend!
